name: opnform
description: OpnForm is an open-source, Airtable-like form builder that allows users to create, share, and collect responses with an integrated UI. It supports REST APIs and can be self-hosted for full data control.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Collect, view, and export form responses with filtering, sorting, and analytics capabilities

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Apply custom themes, colors, and branding to forms for professional appearance and consistency

features.title: Logic Branching
features.description: Create dynamic forms with conditional fields and multi-step workflows based on user responses

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Support file attachments with size limits, type restrictions, and secure storage management

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Automated email alerts for form submissions with customizable templates and recipient lists

features.title: REST API
features.description: REST API access for programmatic form creation, response retrieval, and system integration

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export responses to CSV, Excel, and other formats for analysis and reporting purposes
